riskOfSpire:UsableRelic.NAME: Usable
DESCRIPTIONS: Right click a usable relic to use it. The cooldown of a usable relic decreases at the end of each turn. You may only have one usable relic at a time. Upon picking up a new usable relic, any previously held will be lost #rforever.

riskOfSpire:Infusion.NAME: Infusion
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon killing an enemy, gain #b1 Max HP, up to #b
per stack.

riskOfSpire:BustlingFungus.NAME: Bustling Fungus
DESCRIPTIONS: If you end your turn without playing any attacks, gain #b
#yTemporary #yHP.

riskOfSpire:SoldiersSyringe.NAME: Soldier's Syringe
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b
[REMOVE_SPACE]th #yAttack you play is played twice.

riskOfSpire:RadarScanner.NAME: Radar Scanner
DESCRIPTIONS: Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Cooldown: #b
turns.

riskOfSpire:EffigyOfGrief.NAME: Effigy of Grief
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #b1 #yVulnerable and #b1 #ySlow to yourself and ALL enemies. NL Toggleable.

riskOfSpire:GestureOfTheDrowned.NAME: Gesture of the Drowned
DESCRIPTIONS: The cooldown of usable relics is reduced by #b
% but they are used automatically.

riskOfSpire:DisposableMissileLauncher.NAME: Disposable Missile Launcher
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage random enemy a bunch. NL Cooldown: #b
turns.

riskOfSpire:BundleOfFireworks.NAME: Bundle of Fireworks
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you open a chest or obtain a relic, deal #b
damage to a random enemy #b
times at the start of the next combat.

riskOfSpire:EnergyDrink.NAME: Energy Drink
DESCRIPTIONS: For the first #b
turns of combat, whenever you play a card, gain #b1 #yBlock [REMOVE_SPACE].

riskOfSpire:MonsterTooth.NAME: Monster Tooth
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you kill a non-Minion enemy heal for #b
HP.

riskOfSpire:WaxQuail.NAME: Wax Quail
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain Dexterity, also gain
RoRStS:Blur.

riskOfSpire:AtGMissileMk1.NAME: AtG Missile Mk. 1
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, deal #b
damage to a random enemy.
